context: Vaccination/ Immunization,Intravenous,People Skills,Acute Diarrhea Treatment,Paediatric care,
review: Dr. Ravikumar ********* ** ********** ***** ** ********** providing ******** *** clear explanations about the child's health. Their punctuality is truly commendable; you can always consult him promptly without any unnecessary wait times. What sets Dr. Ravikumar apart is their exceptional friendliness towards both children and parents. He has a remarkable ability to make children feel comfortable and at ease during appointments. Additionally, I was pleasantly surprised by how welcoming they were to medical students, fostering a positive learning environment. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Ravikumar as one of the top-tier pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was so friendly and approachable, he explained so well, also cleared all doubts calmly. He was so friendly and approachable, he explained so well, also cleared all doubts calmly.

tags: None
review: I must share my experience which is my pleasure.the first thing is the clinic is clean and hygienic..which is the one most important thing we expect for to take our babies to.the next most important is very less waiting time.the staffs reach to us and respond to us promptly and take care of us until we have consulted the doctor which makes it very convenient.and about the doctors ,Dr.Ravikumar  was so attentive and listened to all our complaints ,every detail of my child's  condition.after all I can now blindly trust a paediatrician.He is so dedicated and passionate that he took time to consult us even after his slot time was over. Really such a nice gesture of the doctor.i would recommend the doctor.Over all Excellent doctors and clinic
